cab.content: [This Document is the Property of His Britannic Majesty's Government] l1Printed for the Cabinet. March 1922.SECRET.CP. 3862.CIRCULATED BY THE SECRETARY OF STATE FOR WAR. Telegram from Governor of Bombay, to Secretary of State for India, dated 17th March 1922. His Royal Highness has just sailed from Karachi. He had anenthusiastic reception in Karachi and a large assembly of people werepresent on the quay to bid His Royal Highness farewell. INDIA OFFICE,20th March 1922.5262 100 3.22
